snippet.title: SOLRAID Gameplay
snippet.description:
SOLRAID is a single player top-down spaceship shooter.

   - Take control of an advanced ship equipped with shield generators and modular equipment. 

   - Customize your ship with different weapons, armor,  and equipment.

    - Raid randomly generated enemy territories to unlock modules and gather resources to upgrade your ship's equipment.

    - Complete objectives to unlock levels with increasing difficulty. 

    - Reach the final level and destroy the enemy Dreadnought.
